items.title: New device could allow you to taste a cake in virtual reality
items.description: Novel technology intends to redefine the virtual reality experience by expanding to incorporate a new sensory connection: taste.

items.title: New ocelot chip makes strides in quantum computing
items.description: Scientists demonstrate a new quantum chip architecture for suppressing errors using a type of qubit known as a cat qubit.
